unnormalised: Arrey yaar, hi meeting 3:00 AM IST-ak asa? Matlab, tumi lok serious vishayanchea vixim ulovp kortana, hanv moskeank zhunjtai ani 2:30 AM PKT-ak jivitacher chintnam kortolom. Seriously, ami haka prepone korun, kiteak 10:00 AM IST-ak dovrunk zata? Nhoi zalear, hanv 20/02/2020 thavn nhidonk na mhunn dison call-ak yetolom... jem, khorench, sottakodden chodd pois na! Kiteak thodi chai ani biscuits time zones-achea dusrea vatten dhaddunk zanant, eh?
normalised: Arrey yaar, hi meeting tin A-M I-S-T-k asa? Matlab, tumi lok serious vishayanvixin uloita astana, hanv don tis A-M P-K-T-k moskyantonxim zhujtai ani jivitacher chintnam kortalom. Seriously, ami hi prepone korun kiteak naka, mhuntlear dhaa A-M I-S-T? Natar, hanv te call-ak aison distalom ki hanv vis February don hazar ani visa thavn nhidunk na... jem, khorem mhunnlear, satya pasun durlabh na! Kiteak tea time zones bhitor thodi chai ani biscuits dhadd naka, eh?
text: Arrey yaar, hi meeting 3:00 AM IST-ak asa? Matlab, tumi lok serious vishayanchea vixim ulovp kortana, hanv moskeank zhunjtai ani 2:30 AM PKT-ak jivitacher chintnam kortolom. Seriously, ami haka prepone korun, kiteak 10:00 AM IST-ak dovrunk zata? Nhoi zalear, hanv 20/02/2020 thavn nhidonk na mhunn dison call-ak yetolom... jem, khorench, sottakodden chodd pois na! Kiteak thodi chai ani biscuits time zones-achea dusrea vatten dhaddunk zanant, eh?
